testimonials.title: Our Clients' Voice
testimonials.subtitle: The satisfaction of those who trust us is our best guarantee.

reviews.author: Laura M.
reviews.text: Impeccable service. They understood what I needed from the very first moment. I will definitely come back.

reviews.author: Carles R.
reviews.text: Professionalism and attention to detail. They have far exceeded my expectations.

reviews.author: Marta S.
reviews.text: Highly recommended. The treatment is friendly and the final result is excellent.

contact.title: Let's Talk?
contact.description: We are here to help you.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: We answer the most common questions from our clients.

items.question: What are your business hours?
items.answer: We are available from Monday to Friday. For weekend or holiday hours, we recommend contacting us directly.

items.question: How can I contact you?
items.answer: You can easily do so through the contact form on this page, sending us an email, or calling us by phone.

items.question: Do you offer personalized services?
items.answer: Absolutely. We like to adapt to the unique needs of each client. Tell us what you are looking for and we will find the ideal solution.

items.question: Is it necessary to make an appointment?
items.answer: We recommend booking in advance to ensure the best possible attention and avoid waiting, especially during peak hours.

cta_banner.heading: Want to know more?
cta_banner.subheading: We are just a click away to start working together.

services.title: Custom Solutions
